response.overview: Popular Korean boy band Big Bang put on a big show for their fans from January 30 to February 1, 2009, staging a series of large-scale concerts at the Seoul Olympic Stadium. Their sold-out 2009 Big Show, which attracted some 50,000 concertgoers, is captured on this sizzling hot 3-DVD release. Big Bang kicked off the show with Haru Haru, and performed many of their recent hits including My Heaven, NUMBER 1, Lady, and Always. Each member got to display their individual charms and talents in solo segments, with Seung Ri performing his hit single Strong Baby, Dae Sung going trot with "Big Hit", Tae Yang playing the piano in mid-air to Only Look at Me, T.O.P being suave as always with solo "Like Nothing Happened", and leader G-Dragon covering Maroon 5's This Love.
response.title: BIGBANG - 2009 Bigbang Live Concert | Bigshow |
